wikipedia_page.main: Steve Ball (born 22 November 1973) is an English former footballer who made 42 appearances in the Football League playing as a midfielder for Darlington. He began his career as a trainee with Leeds United, played briefly in Ireland for Cork City, and went on to play non-league football for clubs including Farsley Celtic, Emley, Bradford Park Avenue, Harrogate Town, and Guiseley.
